TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You stole one of the NASA supercomputers and the feds are coming! 

I wish for the infinite glove.

Granted. Now you need an infinite hand.

I wish Skynet was playing KSP.

Granted! The terminator now plays KSP.

I wish for KSP to have a god gamemode.

Edited January 17, 2023 by thepres1s_Stuff
oops did it again

Er... that's already a thing.

The cheats menu no longer exists.

I wish for all M and N keys on all keyboards to be swapped

Granted. They're swapped with space bar so you can't dock. 

I wish for a U.S. Visa

Granted. But now the U.S. has mysteriously disappeared. 

I wish for a sandwich made of uranium!

Granted, but the sandwich goes supercritical and explodes just before it would have been considered a sandwich

 

I wish for an easy way of modding KSP while away from KSP

8 hours ago, JcoolTheShipbuilder said:

...but the sandwich goes supercritical and explodes just before it would have been considered a sandwich

May this be a warning to those attempting to make a sandwich with beryllium-infused bread and fissile salami boasting a Uranium kick!

Now as for your wish, it is granted. Your modding projects are outsourced to a modder. But this person is stingy about sharing work. Thus you do not receive your desired mods.

I wish for a tutorial on how to properly design the servo linkage for a V-tail aircraft.

Just now, Exploro said:

May this be a warning to those attempting to make a sandwich with beryllium-infused bread and fissile salami boasting a Uranium kick!

Now as for your wish, it is granted. Your modding projects are outsourced to a modder. But this person is stingy about sharing work. Thus you do not receive your desired mods.

I wish for a tutorial on how to properly design the servo linkage for a V-tail aircraft.

Granted, there are tutorial videos on aircraft with all types of tails! from A to Z, but SPECIFICALLY WITHOUT V

 

I wish for... hmm.. I wish the sky turns purple

Granted. I gave you a single-way ticket to Eve. And BTW I forgot to attach heat shield to the lander, so you'll incinerate in the atmosphere. Adios, Amigo! 

I wish for an ICBM, attached to a SRB. 

Edited January 18, 2023 by Abel Military Services

Granted. You forgot to attach a payload to your SRB, so it became intercontinental.

I wish for Qt 7.0.

So you want Quantumtale 7.0? Here you are! 

I wish for a dystopia government.

Please, stay at your place, the sanitation team is already on its way. To save your time, you can fill the standard "admission of guilt" form, which you can download for free from your Social Health Department webpage.

I wish for diunium octiumide..

7 hours ago, kerbiloid said:

Please, stay at your place, the sanitation team is already on its way. To save your time, you can fill the standard "admission of guilt" form, which you can download for free from your Social Health Department webpage.

I wish for diunium octiumide..

Granted, but it detonates due to being an unknown element

 

I wish for.... hmm.. an easy graphics modding experience!

Granted. Now you can mod your graphic card with brush and colors.

I wish for a grape fruit.

4 hours ago, kerbiloid said:

Granted. Now you can mod your graphic card with brush and colors.

I wish for a grape fruit.

Granted, but they only deliver in no less than 1 million at a time and your entire area is now covered in grapefruits

 

I wish for a jet engine

Granted. You get a car engine, but it's full  of cracks and holes, so the jets of fuel are spraying everywhere.

I didn't wish for grapefruit, I wished for grape fruit.

6 hours ago, kerbiloid said:

I didn't wish for grapefruit, I wished for grape fruit.

what's your wish

I wish for an apple with grapes inside of it

Granted. You buy Zuko "apple" and "grape" powders and mix them together.

I wish to know if natural bottled lemonades and juices actually exist.

(Because synthetic ones are much cheaper and predictable to make).

Granted.  You know.  And you are forced to keep the answer a secret lest you die horribly.

I wish to know the answer to the ultimate question.

Granted. Please wait 7 million years. 

(7 million years later) sorry, but I spend the whole time watching "The hitchhiker's guide to the Galaxy", so you need to wait another 7 million years. 

I wish for the Earth.

Granted, But it explodes.

I wish for unlimited fuel.

Granted, but it too, explodes in an infinite explosion


I wish for an entirely inert cup of water

Granted, but SCP-294 says, "OUT OF RANGE"!

I wish for an infinite IKEA

Granted. Welcome Infinikea. It's at teh opposite side of Laniakea.

I wish Great Attractor was more attractive.
